actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: To provide grants to small business development centers, women's business centers, and chapters of the Service Corps of Retired Executives to allow telework and create marketing materials in response to COVID-19, and for other purposes.

subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text:
Entrepreneurial Development COVID-19 Response Act of 2020

This bill requires the Small Business Administration to award grants for small business development centers, women's business centers, and chapters of the Service Corps of Retired Executives to provide small businesses with specified assistance related to COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019).
